sentences.en: Training involves a two-year residential course.
sentences.cn: 培训包括两年的住校课程。

sentences.en: The television comes with a full two-year warranty.
sentences.cn: 这台电视机有整两年的保修期。

sentences.en: This is a two-year course taught by means of lectures and seminars.
sentences.cn: 这是一门通过讲座和研讨会形式讲授的两年制课程。
